description.value: While invisible, you can’t be seen. You’re @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected] to everyone. Creatures can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} to attempt to detect you; if a creature succeeds at its Perception check against your Stealth DC, you become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden] to that creature until you @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak} to become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected] again. If you become invisible while someone can already see you, you start out @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Hidden] to the observer (instead of @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Undetected]) until you successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.VMozDqMMuK5kpoX4]{Sneak}. You can’t become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Observed] while invisible except via special abilities or magic.
